Bug_report.Environment: iPhone 13 (iOS 16.4.1 safari); Xiaomi Redmi Note 7 (Android 10, Chrome 112)
Bug_report.Title: The images are narrowed when page width is less than 612 px in portrait screen orientation
Bug_report.Steps_to_reproduce: 1. Navigate to capital.com 2. Tap on [burger menu] 3. Tap on menu section [Education] 4. Tap on menu item [CFD trading guide] 5. Scroll down to the images

Bug_report.Actual_Result: Images are narrowed in portrait screen orientation
